title: Environmental Analysis and Documentation Strategy for the Development of an Online Science Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and proficiency in digital tools
context.additional_context: Education on environmental analysis and documentation tool utilization for developing elementary science online education programs for undergraduate students

learning_goals: Utilize documentation tools to systematically analyze online education program environments with over 80% accuracy.

Based on demand survey results for science education programs targeting teenagers, learners will create a 6-month educational plan considering three or more learner types (e.g., visual, auditory, kinesthetic) and achieve over 80% satisfaction in peer evaluations and instructor feedback.
Design a framework for developing science education content applicable in simulation/VR environments.
Establish a management and maintenance system for educational materials using LMS and smart devices.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
